SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.controller

类 AllMatchesController

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.AllMatchesController
所有已实现的接口:
Runnable
public class AllMatchesController extends Thread
The AllMatchesController class manages multiple game matches SingleMatchController instances and coordinates incoming messages from clients. It follows the Singleton pattern to ensure there is only one instance of AllMatchesController in the application. Messages from clients are processed asynchronously using a blocking queue controllerMessages and are dispatched to the appropriate SingleMatchController instance based on the message type.

    • getInstance

      public static AllMatchesController getInstance() throws IOException
      Retrieves the singleton instance of AllMatchesController. If the instance does not exist, it creates a new one.
      返回:
      The singleton instance of AllMatchesController
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during initialization

    • addInQueue

      public void addInQueue(GenericClientMessage temp, Listener listener)
      Adds a client message to the processing queue and associates it with a listener if it is marked as a main controller message.
      参数:
      temp - The client message to add to the queue
      listener - The listener associated with the message

    • run

      public void run()
      The main processing loop for handling client messages. Messages are taken from the queue and either executed directly or forwarded to the appropriate SingleMatchController instance.
      指定者:
      run 在接口中 Runnable
      覆盖:
      run 在类中 Thread

    • createNewMatch

      public Message createNewMatch(CreateGameMessage msg) throws IOException
      Creates a new game match based on the provided CreateGameMessage.
      参数:
      msg - The message containing details for creating a new game match
      返回:
      A message indicating the result of creating the match
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during match creation

    • joinMatch

      public Message joinMatch(JoinGameMessage msg) throws IOException
      Allows a player to join an existing game match based on the provided JoinGameMessage.
      参数:
      msg - The message containing player details and game ID
      返回:
      A message indicating the result of the join operation
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the join process

    • execute

      public void execute(GenericClientMessage msg) throws IOException
      Executes a client message by determining its type and delegating it to the appropriate method.
      参数:
      msg - The client message to execute
      抛出:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during message execution

    • getControllerbyId

      public SingleMatchController getControllerbyId(int id)
      Retrieves the SingleMatchController instance based on the provided ID.
      参数:
      id - The ID of the match controller to retrieve
      返回:
      The SingleMatchController instance corresponding to the ID
